thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 23 of 819
thread.title: Marlena Coelho

author: Marlena Coelho
title: Marlena Coelho
text: My initial order shipped to wrong address but as soon as I contacted customer service they immediately shipped a replacement order to the correct address, promptly, even though the first shipment had not returned to them yet. I really needed the cartridges so they made my day and they did not make it difficult to resolve the problem. I will continue to use their services because they know how to service their customers.
